text: Neusticurus arekuna is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is found in Venezuela and Brazil. ==References== Category:Neusticurus Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Reptiles of Venezuela Category:Reptiles described in 2018 Category:Taxa named by Philippe J.R. title: Neusticurus arekuna
